ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package processed cheese product (such as Velveeta®), cubed
1 (4.5 ounce) can chopped green chiles, undrained

cookingTips: Heat over low to medium-low heat and stir constantly to prevent scorching
Processed cheese melts smoothly and prevents graininess in the dip
Keep the dip warm in a slow cooker on low setting for serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can I keep this queso dip smooth and creamy without it becoming thick as it cools?
